body:
See last posts of #26033 for more infos (copying here as separate issue).

As from subject, the following errors occur at opening and only 3 operations are then available in the "raster" menu. 
[qgis_gui_error.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/7338322/gis_gui_error.txt)

@Sinan81 commented that this could be related to: 
> I think the error has to do with some recent changes to qscintilla package breaking some things and hence QGIS turning of qscintilla support. I'll be looking into this in the following days.
title: qgis@3.16.5 gui errors and missing gdal/raster functions
